alert.note: Alert for Butte; Plumas; Tehama (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:59PM PDT until June 10 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Plumas County in northern California... Northeastern Tehama County in northern California... North central Butte County in northern California... * Until 345 PM PDT. * At 259 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Mineral, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mineral and Lyonsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
